President wa Uganda Gen Yoweri Kaguta Museveni Tibuhaburwa asazzeewo okugira ng’ayimiriza enkola ya EFRIS emu ku nkola z’okusolooza omusolo ebadde evaako kaluma nywera wakati w’abasuubuzi ne URA ne batuuka n’okuggalawo amadduka gabwe.
Abasuubuzi bamaze wiiki namba nga baggadde amadduuka gabwe, nga bawakanya enkola ya EFRIS ( Electronic Fiscal Receipting and Invoicing Solution), ewaliriza abasuubuzi okugaba alisiiti eyungiddwa ku byuma, ku buli byamaguzi byebatunda.
Abasuubuzi bagamba nti enkola 
... 
addukanyamu emirimu gyabwe.
Baasalawo okwekalakasa nga baggalawo amaduuka gabwe okumala wiiki namba.
Mu ensisinako abasubuzi gyebabaddemu ne President Museveni mu makage Entebbe, omukulembeze we ggwanga mweasinzidde nayimiriza enkola ya EFRIS ne ngassi ezitali zimu ku misolo URA gyebadde eggya ku basuubuzi okutuuka nga 7 May,2024.
Abasuubizza okusisinkana abasuubuzi bonna ku kisaawe e Kololo okwongera okutaanya ensonga zino.
Mu ensisinako eno era Museveni ategezeza nti wakusisinkana abakulu mu m
...
era e ggwanga, wamu n’abakungu mu URA bongere okumubuulira enkola z’emisolo bwezikola, olwo asisinkane abasuubuzi nga 7 May,2024 asalewo ekyenkomeredde.
Minister wa Kampala Hajjat Minsa Kabanda ategeezezza CBS nti ebyatuukiddwako wakati wa president n’abasuubuzi wakukakasa nti biteekebwa mu nkola okutuusa lwebanaddamu okumusisinkana nga bweyasuubizza.
Ye ssentebe wa basubuzi mu kibiina Kya KACITA Tadeous Nagenda Musoke agambye nti ensisinako yabwe ne president Museveni yabadde yabibala byereere.

Tonny Odur yesoose okuteebera Express goolo ya peneti mu kitundu ekyasoose ate Daniel Ssserunkuuma owa Vipers nasubwa peneti mu kitundu kyekimu. Mu kitundu ekyokubiri, Tito Okello avude ku katebe okuteeba goolo y’ekyenkanyi yadde nga alabise nga abade akuumye. Vipers kati erina obubonero 15 nga beekana ne KCCA FC era bombi tebanakubwamu sizoni eno ate Express kati erina obubonero 12.

OMUZIBIZI wa ‘Crested Crane’ ttiimu y’eggwanga ey’omupiira mu bakazi Jean Namayega Sseninde ayabulidde Queens Park Rangers WFC ne yeegatta ku Wakefield...
MAROONS FC ne Tooro United zijulidde ku by’okusalwako mu liigi ya babinywera nga zigamba nti FUFA yazizzaayo mu bukyamu kuba liigi teyaggwa.
WAKATI mu kulwana emalire mu bifo eby'oku mwanjo eddeyo mu mpaka za Bulaaya, Arsenal yaakakubwa emipiira ebiri egiddiring’ana.

Bya Emmanuel Mugeere
Luweero
Omwami wa Kabaka amukulembererako essaza Bulemeezi, Omulangira Ronald Mulondo asabye abakulembeze okulondawo basobole okutuusa empeereza mu bantu ba Kabaka era basobole okubagazisa okwettanira empeereza z’Obwakabaka.
Okusaba kuno Kkangawo Mulondo akukoledde Kasana- Luweero bw’abadde asisinkanye akabondo k’ababaka ba Palamenti abava e Luweero aka Bulemeezi Parliamentary Forum awamu n’abakulembeze ab’enjawulo mu kitundu kino.
“Njagala okwebaza ababaka ba Palamenti bonna bassentebe ba disitulikiti wamu n’abamagombolola nti omulimu bagukoze bulungi era mbeebaza olw’obumu bwe boolesezza era mbasaba munyweze obumu tusobole okugenda mu maaso.” Kkangaawo Mulondo bwe yagambye.
Bano bakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku nsonga enkulu eziruma abantu mu kitundu kino era basazeewo okubaga ekiwandiiko ekyawamu kye bagenda okutwala mu Palamenti nga babanja okuweebwa ebintu ebigasiza awamu bannabulemeezi awatali njawukana za byabufuzi.
Bano era baagala gavumenti esasule ebintu bya Bannabulemeezi bye baafiirwa mu lutalo olwaleeta gavumenti eno mu buyinza era kijja kuyamba nnyo singa gavumenti esinga okufaayo ku ebyo ebibayambira awamu.
Akulira akabondo kano, Brendah Nabukenya yasabye banne okukola buli kimu okutumbula embeera z’abantu baabwe mu kitundu kino era n’abasaba okukolera awamu.
Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu abakulembeze b’essaza, Omumyuka asooka owa Kkangaawo Margaret Mutyaba, omumyuka owookubiri Aaron Ddamulira, omuwanika w’essaza James Kyeyune n’abalala.

Bya Eria Luyimbazi
OMUSAJJA omugwenyufu akkakkanye ku bbujje ery’omwaka gumu n’alisobyako.
Godfrey Kinaalwa (waggulu), omutuuze w’e Ndeeba mu Tomusange zooni ye yakoze ekikolwa kino. Jjajja w’omwana (Christine Naggayi) yategeezezza nti Kinaalwa asula ku muliraano gwabwe yabadde azannyisa omwana ono nga bw’amusitula mu bbanga kyokka bwe yalabye nga tewali amulaba n’amusobyako.
“Nabadde mu nnyumba ne ndaba Kinaalwa ng’azannyisa omwana amubuusa mu bbanga naye nagenze okuddamu okulaba omwana ng’alina omusaayi mu ngalo ne ndowooza nti osanga ggirita y’emusaze kyokka n’agenze okulaba ng’ate guva mu bitundu bye bya kyama ate nga ne Kinaalwa talabikako,” Naggayi bwe yagambye.
Omutuuze Hajati Zamu Namakula yagambye nti oluvannyuma lwa Kinaalwa okusobya ku mwana, yadduse wabula n’akomawo akawungeezi abatuuze ne bamukwata era poliisi n’eyitibwa.
Omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Ibin Ssenkumbi yategeezezza nti omusawo wa poliisi yakakasiza nti omwana ddala yasobezeddwaako, entegeka ne zikolebwa okutwala Kinaawa okukeberebwa omusaayi okuzuula oba aliana akawuka ka siriimu n’okumukebera omutwe. Yaguddwaako omusango gw’okusobya ku mwana ku fayiro SD: 30/06/06/ 2013.
Omusajja sobezza ku bbujje

Ekibiina ekiddukanya omupiira ku semazinga Africa ekya CAF, kironze baddiifiri bannauganda okulamula omupiira ogw’empaka za CAF Champions League omutendera ogusembayo ogwa preliminary round.
Omupiira guno gugenda kubeera wakati wa club ya AS Douanes eya Burkina Faso ne club ya CR Belouizdad eya Algeria.
Omupiira guno gugenda kuzannyibwa nga nga 14 September,2024 mu kibuga Bamako.
William Oloya yalondeddwa okubeera mu kisaawe wakati, agenda kuyambibwako abawuubi b’ekitambala okuli Hakim Mulindwa ne Brianson Musisi.
George Olemu ye ddifiri owokuna mu mipiira guno.
Bisakiddwa: Isah Kimbugwe

Endagabutonde ezigugubira eddagala eritta ebiwuka zitera okukwanyizibwa n’ebiva ku pleiotropic ku byafaayo by’enneeyisa z’ensiri.
Wabula, waliwo obubaka butono nnyo ku kukosebwa kw’okugugubira eddagala eritta ebiwuka ku nsiri ezinuuna omusaayi.
Wano, nga tukozesa metabolic markers ezaakazuulibwa era nga ezeesigamiziddwa ku DNA mu kisinga okutambuza omusujja gw’ensiri An.Funestus twanoonyereza ku ngeri metabolic resistance genes gye ziyinza okukosa ennuuna y’omusaayi ng’emmere.
Oluvannyuma lw’oku
... 
kunuuna obulungi omusaayi mu bantu.
Kino era kisobola okwongeza obusobozi bwazo okusaasaanya omusujja gw’ensiri.
Ezimu ku nsiri z’omusujja zisobola okugumira obukambwe bw’eddagala eritta ebiwuka nga zikola bulungi ku ddagala lino mu mibiri gyazo.
Okuguguba okw’engeri eno eri eddagala eritta ebiwuka kuva ku bulagabutonde okumanyiira, naye nga tekimanyiddwa oba nga waliwo ebintu ebirala ensiri bye zirina olw’okumanyiira okw’engeri eyo okujjira ku bulagabutonde.
Mu kunoonyereza kuno, abanoonyereza 
...
siri gye zeegattamu n’engeri gye zisaasaanya omusujja gw’ensiri.
Era balabula nti okugezesa okumu okwakolebwa mu kunoonyereza kwabwe tekwali kulungi era kuyinza okuba nga kwakosa bye baazuula.
Kikulu nnyo okutegeera engeri endagabutonde z’ensiri n’enneeyisa yaazo gy’ekyukakyukamu nga zaanukula engeri gye tuzifuga, gamba nga tukozesa eddagala eritta ebiwuka buli kiseera.
Abanoonyereza mu kunoonyereza kuno baava mu Cameroon, eyo gye baggya sampolo z’ensiri ezimu ezaakozesebwa mu kunoonyereza kuno.

Gulabiddwa Joseph Ssemwanga agwekanze mu nnimiro gye yakedde okulima ng'ababbi bamukubye ennyondo ku mimwa ne bamuyiwa amannyo.
Bazzizzaako okumutugisa olukoba lw'eggaali ne balumusibisa akandooya emikono n'amagulu olwo ne bamukasuka mu nnimiro.
Ettemu lino libadde ku kyalo Kasuula A e Kyamuliibwa mu Kalungu.
Taata Sserugo nga tannazirika ategeezezza nti eno pikipiki ya kusatu gye babbye ku Kasibante mwe batwalidde n'obulamu bwe.
Abakulembeze Godfrey Ssagala, Galabuzi Ssekimpi,HarunaMwesigwa ne Joseph Mugagga bekokkodde ettemu erisitudde enkundi mu kitundu ng'ate likolebwa n'abaana enzaalwa z'ekitundi.
Beegatiddwaako abatuuze okekwokkola nti nayo Poliisi tebayambye kukangavvula bamenyi b'amateeka ng'ebayimbula tebawozeseddwa mu kkooti.
Poliisi esindikiddwa DPC Charles Okello eggyewo omulambo n'egutwala mu ddwaliiro e Masaka nga bw'eyigga abatemu.

Police ye Wandegeya ekutte era n’eggalira abavubuka ababadde bakunganidde ku club Obligato mu Kampala, okulaga obutali bumativu eri government olw’okugaana okujaguza olunaku lw’abwe.
Olunaku lw’okwefumiitiriza ku nsonga z’abavubuka olw’ensi yonna olumanyiddwa nga lnternational Youth Day, lukuzibwa buli nga 12 omwezi gwa August.
Abakulembeze b’abavubuka okuva mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo okuli Mpigi, Kayunga, Mukono n’abalala beebakunganye nga babadde baagala kugenda ku parliament okutwalayo okwemulugunya kw’abwe eri sipiika .
Basoose kwogerako eri bannamawulire, nebabasomera ekiwandiiko ekiraga okwemulugunya kw’abwe, nga baagala government etondewo ministry y’abavubuka eyeetongodde.
Bagala president abalonde minister owaabavubuka nga naye muvubuka anaasobola okutegeera ebibaluma.
Bagamba nti bewuunya okulaba nga government tesobola kukwata bukadde 30 obwa Uganda, okutegeka olunaku lw’abwe, kyokka ng’ekibiina Kya NRM kyasaasanya obuwumbi obuwera 17 mu kulonda kwa 2021.
Police tebaganyizza kweyongerayo ku parliament, ng’egamba nti babadde bakubye olukungaana olutali mu mateeka n’okusasamaza eggwanga.
Kinajjukirwa nti olunaku lwajjo minister w’ebyensimbi Matia Kasaija yabadde mu kakiiko ka parliament akalondoola ebyenfuna naakyogera kaati nti government terina nsimbi, emisaala gy’abakozi egimu teginasasulwa n’emirimu emirala mingi gitambula kasoobo.
Bisakiddwa: Ddungu Davis

Amawulire
Ebigezo bya siniya eyokuna bitandise bulungi mu ggwanga lyonna
Bya Mike Sebalu,
Ekitongole ekivunanyizibwa ku bigezo mu gwanga ki UNEB kitegeezezza ng’ebigezo bya S4 bwebijiddwako akawuwo mu mirembe okwetoloola wonna mu gwanga enkya ya leero.
Abayizi bano batandise n’okubala paper esooka nga ne mu district eziri ku muggalo gwa Ebola eya Kassanda ne Mubende naye embeera etambula bulungi.
Omugatte gw’abayizi emitwalo 34 mu 9455 bebewandiisa okutuula ebigezo bino okwetolola Uganda yonna mu bifo 3,703.
Mu bifo awatuuliddwa ebigezo bino kuliko n’ekomera e Luzira eno ng’abasibe 51 bebatuuliddeyo ebigezo.
Ayogerera ekitongole ki UNEB Janipher Kalule mu kiwandiiko kyafulumizza ettuntu lya leero, ategeezezza nga UNEB bweri okukolaganira awamu n’abatwala eby’okwerinda okwetoloola eggwanga okumalawo ebyo byonna ebiyinza okusomooza.
Agamba nti abakuuma dembe abaweredde ddala 1595, aba scout 1,611 bano begatiddwako ba supervisors ne ba Invigilators emitwalo 2 mu 2214 okuwa obukuumi ebigezo bino okwetoloola eggwanga.
Kinnajjukirwa, ekitongole mu teeka empya elilungamya enkuuma y’ebigezo, kyateekawo ebibonerezo ebikakali eri omuntu yenna anasangibwa nga yenyigira mu mivuyi egyekuusa ku kubba ebigezo omuli okusibibwa mu komera wakati w’emyaka 5-10 oba okusasula engassi ya bukadde bw’ensi obuli wakati wa 20-40 oba okukola ebibonerezo byonna.

Abamu ku babaka ba parliament batuula bufoofofo nga bagamba nga bagamba nti waliwo abajaasi ba UPDF abatandise okulamuza ebifo by’obubaka bwa parliament ababaka abo byebalimu.
Ababaka bano nga batuula ku kakiiko ka parliament akalondoola eddembe ly’obuntu, basinzidde mu nsisiinkano y’akakiiko n’abakulu mu ministry y’ebyokwerinda abakulembeddwamu minister w’ebyokwerinda Vincent Bamulangaki Ssempijja nebamuttotolera ensonga zabwe.
Julius Tom Ekudo omubaka wa Gweri agambye nti government bwetaggye maggye mu kalulu k’okulonda ,eggwanga lino bagenda kulisuulamu kinnya ekiwanvu ddala.
Omubaka Ono awadde ekyokulabirako nti mu kulonda okubindabinda e Dokolo eky’okulonda omubaka omukyala, amaggye geesomye dda era gali mu kweteekateeka okwenyigira mu kulonda okwo kyagambye nti kikyamu nnyo
Ababaka abalala bagamba nti bannamagye abakyaali mu buweereza bwamagye bangi abagala okwesimbawo era baatandiika dda okulamuza ebifo by’obubaka bwa parliament newankubadde ekiseera ky’akalulu tekitukanga.
Bawanjagidde minister w’ebyokwerinda alagire amagye gakome ku bajaasi abo, kubanga bababuzizaako obwekyuusizo.’
Minister Ssempijja abasuubizza nti ensonga eno amagye ne ministry yebyokwerinda egenda kugikutunulamu

BYA SAUL WOKULIRA
ABATUUZE abasoba mu 300 basobeddwa eka ne mu kibira oluvannyuma lw’okugobaganyizibwa ku bibanja byabwe nga tebaliyiriddwa.
Abatuuze abaakoseddwa bava ku byalo Kiswa, Gayaza ne Kyampisi mu ggombolola y’e Nazigo mu disitulikiti y’e Kayunga.
Aba disitulikiti y’e Kayunga baatunda olusozi olusangibwa e Kyampisi eri kkampuni emu egenda okwasa amayinja aganaakozesebwa mu kukola oluguudo oluva e Mukono okuyita e Kayunga ne lugguka e Njeru mu disitulikiti y’e Buikwe.
Abatuuze baasengudd
... 
do okwasa amayinja ng'ekozesa bbaluti ku lusozi olwo.
Abatuuze okulaga obutali bumativu baabadde basisinkanye omubaka wa Ntenjeru North mu Palamenti, Patrick Nsanja ne baamutottolera ebizibu ebiboolekedde omuli okusula enjala kubanga emmere yaabwe bagibalesezza so nga tebaweereddwa bbanga ggere kunoonya gye balaga.
Abatuuze bagamba nti baawebwa emitwalo 80 gyokka buli omu, kyokka aba LC ne babawoozaako emitwalo 5 buli muntu olw’ensonga ezitamanyiddwa olwo ne basigaza emitwalo 75 ezitaliiko kye z
...
ga kiro mu ttumbi nga babateekesa emikono ku biwandiiko bye batamanyi.
Waliwo n’essomero abaasa amayinja lye baagambye nti lyakumala emyaka etaano ng'abaana tebasoma kuba bayinza okukosebwa amayinja agagenda okwasibwa.
Abatuuze era baategeezezza nti mu kukuba bbaluti ezaasooka waliwo ebisolo byabwe ebyavaamu amawako.
Omubaka Nsanja yagumizza abatuuze n'abakuutira okunywerera ku nsonga basobole okufuna obwenkanya era n’asuubiza okubeegattako singa gavumenti tefaayo kuwuliriza kwemulugunya kwabwe.

Amawulire
Bakiggala bakukuluma
Bya Ivan Ssenabulya,
Abamasomero g’abaana ba kiggala bakukulumidde abatwala eby’enjigiriza mu gwanga olwokubasulirirra.
Bano bagamba nti basanze okusomoozebwa okwamaanyi mu kiseera kyomuggalo, naye tewali buyambi bwonna gavumenti bweyabatusiza.
Akulira Hand in Hand abalabirira abaana ba kiggala mu kibuga Mukono, nga ye Loyce Takwodwori agambye nti abaana abalala baatekebwa ku mwanjo era babagerako mu ntekateeka yokuggulawo amasomero naye bbo tebamanyi kidako
Agambye nti abaana bano betaaga ebitabo kwebasomera kubanga byanjawulo naye tebabirina, atenga nemu kusoma kwa TV ne Radio mu muggalo tebalowozebwako oba okubawa abataputa.

KAMPALA: Gavumenti yeddiza enteekateeka zonna ez’okuziika n’okomyawo omubiri gw’a Ssaabasumba wabasodokisi eyaffa kunkomerero ya sabiiti ewedde.
Mungeri yeemu Paapa w’eAlexandria asasidde abasodokisi n’ebanna Uganda olwokuviibwako Ssaabasumba nga obubaka abutisse omulabirizi w’eGulu n’obuvanjuba Silvester Kisitu.
Saawa zibadde ziwera musanvu n’ekitundu omusumba Silvester Kisitu nga Ono nga yabadde ajanjaba omugenzi atuuse ku ekeresiya e Namungoona okuva muggwanga lya Buyonaani eyafiriddwa Ssaaba
... 
mbiro Kya Misa ekyetabiddwamu n’eminista owamawulire n’okulungamya eggwanga Chris Baryomunsi, ababaka ba palamenti n’abantu abalala.
Silvester wano wasomedde obubaka bwa Paapa w’e Alexandria eri abakungubazi.
Minista Chris Baryomunsi wano wasinzidde nasoma obubaka bwa pulezidenti saako gavumenti.
Ono ategezezza nga gavumenti bwegenda okutwala enteekateeka zonna nga nakawungeezi bevumbye akafubo.
Akulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu palamenti Mathias Mpuuga nga awerekeddwako ababaka abatali bam
...
a bwebatyo nebatuuka n’okuwagira okuva era akulira ekibiina Kya NUP Robert Kyagulanyi Sentamu.
Mpuuga atenderezza nnyo omugenzi olwokufaayo ennyo kunsonga eziruma omuntu wawansi nazogerako nga bbo tebalina kyebamubanja.
Abakulembeze abenjawulo okubadde ababaka ba palamenti nga Hellen Nakimuli ow’eKalangala, Abubaka Kawalya owa Lubaga North, meeya we Rubaga Mbeeraze Zacchy Mawula nabalala batenderezza omugenzi.
Omubiri gw’a Ssaabasumba gusuubirwa okutuuka muggwanga ku balaza ya sabiiti ejja.

BYA MARIA NAKYEYUNE
Abatuuze ku kyaalo Kabundi mu ggombolola y'eMateete mu Disitulikiti y'eSembabule basanze akaseera akazibu okuziika munnaabwe Kasiita Kennedy Omusuubuzi mu kitundu kino eyafudde ekikutuko olunaku lweggulo ng'oluleese omulambo ewa kitaawe n'agubagobesa nti yamuzaalukuka dda olw'okuwasa omukyala eyeddira omuziro gwe gumu "Empologoma" ne nnazaala we era n'alagira nti tagenda kuziikibwa ku kiggya kyabwe.
Ssentebe w'ekyalo kino Joseph Kawooya ategeezezza nti ensonga zino baazituulamu ng'akakiiko ne babakkaanyisa ne kitaawe kyokka ne bigaana nga baali baasalawo ensonga zidde mu kika kyabwe wabula kibakubye encukwe okulaba ng'omuvubuka ono afudde tezinnagonjoolwa.
Wabula abatuuze oluvannyuma baakozesezza ekifuba ne baleeta omulambo mu maka gano ne bakola enteekateeka z'okuziika era omugenzi yaziikiddwa akawungeezi ku Ssande ku saawa mukaaga nga n'abatuuze beeyiye mu bungi ku ntaana awatali kwewa mabanga ng'emu ku ngeri y'okulwanyisa ekirwadde kya COVID 19.

Bya Ssemakula John
Kampala
Minisita w’ebyokwerinda, Maj Gen Jim Muhwezi akakasizza bannayuganda nga bwewatali nsonga erina kubeeraliikiriza ku kkampuni ya Russia eyaweereddwa olukusa okuteeka obuuma obulondoola mu mmotoka ne Pikipiki.
Kino kiddiridde bannayuganda okutandika okubuusabuusa kkampuni eno eya Joint Stock Company Global eyaweereddwa endagaano y’emyaka 10 olw’ebigambibwa nti etubidde mu mabanja.
Kigambibwa nti kkampuni eno erina emisango gyetuuka nagyo era nga kigambibwa nti ebangibwa 
... 
alidde dda amagezi.
“Minisitule y’ebyokwerinda yategedde ku biyitingana ku bizibu by’ebyensimbi ebya kkampuni ya Global Security. Naye nga Ssaabawolereza bweyalung’amizza, enteekateeka eno erudde nga ekolebwako era ebimu ku bino byakanyizibwako dda,” Muhwezi bwe yagambye nga ayita ku mukutu gwa Twitter.
Minisita Muhwezi agamba nti obuwaayiro obuli mu ndagaano eno bulambulukufu era buwa gavumenti obuyinza okukuuma obulungi ebikwata ku bigenda okukung’aanyizibwa singa wabaawo ebirumira.
Okusinziir
...
reza wa gavumenti yategeezezza omukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network nti woofiisi ye yenyigira butereevu mu kuteeka omukono ku ndagaano ne kkampuni eno, era nakakasa nti tewali nsonga erina kwelariikiriza bannayuganda.
“Kituufu, endagaano yaleetebwa mu woofiisi yange, twagikakasa era tulowooza nti nnungi. Twagikakasa nga tumaze okwekeneenya amateeka gaffe era tukakasa nti tewaliwo musango gwonna gukwatagana na mabanja gwebawaabira kkampuni eno mu Uganda,” Ssaabawolereza Kiryowa Kiwanuka bwe yagambye.

Wabula bangi, naddala abali mu masomero ag’obwannannyini, basaba Gavumenti ebeeko engeri gy’egawagiramu okusobola okutuukiriza obukwakkulizo bwonna obunassibwawo okutangira Corona okukwata abayizi.
Okunoonyereza okwakoleddwa aba M&E BESO foundation, nga bakulemberwa John William Kasamba, kuzudde nti amasomero mangi tegalina busobozi kuteeka mu nkola biragiro bya minisitule y’Ebyobulamu ne wankubadde ng’omutima ogwagala okusomesa bagulina.
Abakulira amasomero bategeezezza nti wadde tebannaba kufu
... 
 eby’enjawulo kwalaze nti amasomero mangi gaakoseddwa nnyo embeera ya Corona era nga weetaaga okubaawo ekikolebwa mu bwangu okugadduukirira gasobole okukola omulimu omutuufu.
Wakiso ne Kampala bye bitundu ebisingamu amasomero agobwannannyini, kyokka ebitundu 91 ku 100 galaga nti gatubidde mu mabanja ga bbanka.
Okutwalira awamu amasomero agali mu bibuga gatambulira ku mabanja olw’okuvuganya okw’amaanyi okusinziira ku kunoonyereza, ate agali mu byalo geewola kitono nnyo.
Okutangira obulwadde bangi
...
umbi 20 baziteeka mu SACCO y’abasomesa zisobole okubayambako okudda engulu.
Kironde yagambye nti ssente zino za basomesa era be baalina okuzeewola okuzikozesa sso si bannannyini masomero. John Fred Kazibwe, akulira Mengo SS, yategeezezza nti ensonga eno tasobola kugyogerako kubanga tebannaba kufuna kiwandiiko kyonna okuva mu minisitule.
Hajji Jamir Buwembo owa Kakungulu Memorial Kibuli, yagambye nti beetegefu okuggulawo basomese kyokka bakyalinda ddoboozi ettongole okuva mu Gavumenti.

Olunaku lwolwaleero lwandirwawo okudawo mubyafaayo bya Uganda oluvanyuma Lwa munakisinde kya ‘People power‘ ate nga yemukulembeze wa National Unity Platform Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentambu abasinga gwebakazako erya Bobi Wine okukyaalako eri embuga.
Mukabanga akayise wabaddewo obumulu mulu wakati wabawagizi ba Bobi Wine ne Buganda nga bagamba nti Buganda esirise nnyo kunsonga eziruma bana Uganda.
Wabula webukeredde enkya ya leero nga Bobi Wine ayitidwa e Mengo ku yafeesi ya Katikiro Charles Pater Mayega mwebafunidde emboozi eyakafubo nga bagegese wakati wa katikiro awamu nabakulembeze bekisinde kya People power kwosa NUP.
Mumboozi jebanyumiza, Katikiro asinzidde wano nategezza nga abantu ba Ssabasajja webalina okulonda omukulembeze oyo anabakolera ate nga aweesa ne Ssabasajja Kabaka Ekitibwa.
Ye Bobi Wine asinzidde awo nategeza nga webatali mulutalo na Katikiro awamu no Buganda nga abasinga webabadde babitambuza.
Bobi Wine asubirwa okugenda okutongozebwa kwabo abanesimbawo kubukulembembeze bwegwanga nga enaku zomwezi ssatu omwezi ogwa Musenene.
ALSO READ: Bobi Wine to get a massive win over Yoweri Kaguta Museveni in 2021 elections

Bebakekejjula mu mbugo bagala kubagatta ku baliko obulemu
Bya Musasi Waffe
Ebbiina lyabakazi, abagamba nti bakolebwako ebikolwa byokubakekejjula mu mbugo mu buvubuka, bongedde okweyiwa ku wofiisi yomubaka wa gavumenti mu disitulikiti ye Bukwo.
Bano bagala bagattibwe ku lukalala lwabaliko obulemu, basobole okuyambibwa gavumenti.
Kino kikakasiddwa omubaka wa gavumenti e Bukwo, Samuel Hashaka Mpimbaza wabula agambye nti kino kijja kutunulwamu minisitule yekikula kyabanti, kubanga kyamususseeko.
Betty Cherop omu ku bakolebwako ebikolwa bino, agambye nti obulamu bwabwe tebukyali kyekimu, okuva lwebatusibwako obulemu buno.
Gavumenti yayisa etteeka eriwera okusala abawala nabakazi mu mbugo, mu mwaka gwa 2010, ngomusango guliko ekibonerezo kyakusibwa emyaka 10.
Mungeri yeemu kino era kiemanya mateeka ku mutendera gwensi yonna.

Kkooti esookerwako e e Kajjansi, ebadde ekubirizibwa omulamuzi Karungi Doreen Olga asindise mu kkooti enkulu, Hajji Ali Mwizerwa, okulinda okwewozaako.
Hajji Ali nga mutuuze ku kyalo Bweya, Kajjansi, yakwatibwa olwa mukyala we Nakisuyi Zuula, okuvaayo mu lwatu ng’ali maziga, ng’amulumiriza okusobya ku mwana we, muggya na nnyina myaka 14 ng’ali mu S 2.
Mu kkooti, oludda oluwaabi lukomekereza okunoonyereza era bwatyo, Hajji Ali, asindikiddwa mu kkooti enkulu, wakati mu kkooti ebadde ekubyeko namun
... 
bujjulizi bulaga nti
– Omwana yamusobyako emirundi egiwera wakati wa May – September, 2024
– Hajji Ali yasuubiza okutta omwana singa ategezaako omuntu yenna
– Omwana yekebejjebwa abasawo nga 1, October, 2024 ne bazuula nti yasobezebwako
– Nga 2, October, 2024, Hajji Ali yakeberebwa abasawo ne bazuula nti mulamu nga ne bwongo, tekuli buzibu bwonna.
Mu kkooti enkulu, bagenda kwesigama nnyo
– Ebbaluwa y’abasawo eraga nti kituufu omwana yasobezebwako
– Ebbaluwa y’obuzaale, eraga emyaka gy’omwana
– M
...
, Hajji Ali gye yali agenda okusobya ku mwana
– Ebifaananyi by’ekisenge
– Abaluwa y’abasawo eyava mu kwekebejja Hajji Ali
– N’ebiwandiiko byonna, kkooti byeyinza okusaba.
Mu kiseera kino, Hajji Ali asindikiddwa ku limanda okutuusa kkooti enkulu lwerimuyita, okutandiika okuwuliriza emisango gye.
Wabula Omulamuzi wa kkooti enkulu mu Kampala, Isaac Muwata wakuddamu nga 18, November, 2024, okuwuliriza okusaba kwa Hajji Ali okweyimirirwa.

OMUDUUMIZI wa Maggye g’okuttaka Gen. Muhoozi Kainerugaba akoowodde abavubuka abaagala okwegatta ku Ggye lye Ggwanga UPDF okuba obulindaala kubanga ssawa yonna okuwandiika kutandika.
Okusinziira ku bubaka bwatadde ku mukutu gwe ogwa Twitter Muhoozi agambye nti kye kiseera abavubuka abato abalina omutima gwe Ggwamnga lyabwe Uganda okuyingira amaggye batendekebwe oluvanyuama bafulume nga balina amayinja ku bifuba (KADETI)
Agambye nti ekibinja kya bawandiika kigenda kutalaaga e Ggwanga lyonna nga basunsula abavubuka abalina ebisanyizo okuli abo abamaze siniya ey’omukaaga n’okugenda waggulu, nga balamu bulungi era nga bannaUganda ddala.
Kati emyaka giyisiwo 2 bukya Ggye lya UPDF likomya okuwandiisa abajaasi nga basemba kuwandiika ba LDU

Omulimi ng’ayanika kasooli.
KampalaBya EDWARD SSERINNYA
ABALIMI ba kasooli mu bukiikaddyo bwa Kenya bali mu kusattira oluvannyuma lwa kasooli waabwe okulumbibwa ekirwadde kya ‘Maize Lethal Necrosis’ ekimwengeza ebikoola n’akala nga tannakula.
Eyeebuuzibwako eby’obulimi n’obulunzi mu Wakiso, Dr. Bered Buye agamba nti, ‘Maize Lethal Necrosis’ kawuka akaleetebwa obuwuka obuwerako nga bukwataganye naye nga katera kubaawo singa akawuka k’engano ke bayita Wheat Steak Mosaic Virus (WSMV) kakwatagana n’
... 
tendera, naye kasinga kumuyiikiriza ng’atandika okuleeta oluyange oba ng’atandiikiriza okuweeka.
Okuziyiza okusaasaana
Buye agamba nti, wadde nga mu Uganda tekaliimu, tekitegeeza nti tekasobola kutuuka, kuba ensigo ezimu ze tusimba wano ziva Kenya n’olwekyo kasobola
okutuuka wano.
Bw’olaba kasooli wo ng’atandise okukala mu ngeri etetegeerekeka naddala ng’asooka kuba wa kyenvu, tegeeza ku batwala ebyobulimi mu kitundu kyo.
1. Omusiri gwonna ogulumbiddwa obulwadde buno gulina okusaayibwa ate kasoo
...
oli mu Kenya bagamba nti, Uganda y’emu ku nsi gye boolekedde okugula kasooli mu January 2013,
Kubanga ewaabwe gavumenti yaweze dda ekitundu kino okusimba kasooli ate nga kye kimu ku bisinga okuvaamu kasooli aliikiriza Kenya ate singa obulwadde buno bubuna Kenya yonna olwo tujja kukuba gudiikudde kuba bajja kuba mu bwetaavu
bwa kasooli era bajja kumugula wano.
Kino kigenda kuleetawo okuvuganya mu katale mu Uganda ate n’alima kasooli wa sizoni eno akatale weekali era wandibadde oyongeramu amaanyi.

MINISITA w’ebyenjigiriza ebyawaggulu J.C.Muyingo asabye abakulira amatendekero okusomesa abayizi amasomo aganabayamba okuvuganya mu katale ke mirimu.
Bino abyogeredde ku matikkira g’ettendekero lya Global Institute of Information Technology & Business,Makerere agw’omulundi ogw’okuna.
Agambye nti guno omulembe abantu tebakyabuuza diguli meka omuntu z’alina wabula obukugu n’obusoobozi kwebasinziira okuwa omuntu omulimu.
Abakulira amatendekero abawadde amagezi okulekerawo okusomesa amasomo agatatunkana na mbeera ya katale k’emirimu mu ggwanga.
Ate abayizi yabalabudde obutagezaako kwenyigira mu bikolwa bya kwekalaakasa,obuli bw’enguzi n’okwekuma nga balamu Ssaako okubeera abetoowaze.
Ben Opolot omutandisi we ttendekero lino asabye gavumenti okubakendereza ku bisale bye bigezo bye kitongole kya Uganda Business and Technical Examination Board (UBTEB) ebiri waggulu ate ng’abayizi babikola buli lusoma.
Omukolo gwetabiddwako n’omukunganya w’olupapula lwa Bukedde Geoffery Kulubya ,abazadde n’abayizi nga wabaddewo okwolesa ebitone n’ebintu ebirala ebisomesebwa.

Museveni Atongozza Enkalala za NRM, Alabudde Abaagala Okutaataganya Enteekateeka Z'ekibiina
Omukulembeze w’eggwanga era Ssentebe w'Ekibiina kya NRM Yoweri Tibihaburwa Kaguta Museveni alabudde abagenda okukulemberamu enteekateeka y’okuwandiisa n’okuzza obuggya enkalala z’abalonzi mu kibiina kya NRM n’agamba nti singa bano banagezaako okudibaga enteekateeka eno boolekedde okutwalibwa e Luzira okumala ebbanga lya myaka musanvu. Museveni olwaleero atongozza enteekateeka ey’okuzza obujja enkalala z’abalonzi mu kibiina kino wakati nga beetegekera okulonda okwa 2026.

Minisita wa Kampala Beti Olive Namisango Kamya asubirwa okulabikako mu lukiiko lwa Kampala Capital City Authority (KCCA) enkya ya leero, okutangaza ku ntambuza y'emirimu gye.
Mu lukiiko olwatuula sabiti ewedde nga lukulembeddwamu Omuloodi Ssalongo Erias Lukwago lwafulumya ekiwandiiko nga minisita Kamya etekeddwa okujja mu lukiiko olunnaku olwaleero okutangaza biki ebiri mu bbago eryatwalibwa mu Palamenti, okukyusa mu ssemateeka wa KCCA.
Lukwago agamba nti batekeddwa mu nzikiza ku nsonga z'ebbago nga minisita Kamya atekeddwa okutangaza olukiiko ku nsonga ezo.
Wabula sabiti ewedde Minisita Kamya yavaayo n'agamba nti okukiika mu lukiiko lwa KCCA tekikola makulu nga bakansala batekeddwa okuteesa, ebyogeddwako bisindikibwa mu offisi ye, okubyekenenya.

OBUCAAFU Obufumbekedde mu bitundu by'e Kawempe bwewanisizza abatuuze emitima olw'okutya okulumbibwa endwadde eziva ku bucaafu.
Omu ku batuuze ategeerekeseeko erya Jane Namuddu owe Bwaise ategeezezza nti abaana n'abantu abakulu balwala embuto ng'era kati abamu ku bazadde basazeewo okusibira abaana baabwe mu mayumba okusobola okubatangira enddwadde zebayinza okufuna okuva mu bucaafu.
Namuddu ategeezezza nti bwekibeera nga ddala kituufu abakulembeze babalumirirwa basaba okuviira ddala ku mubaka wa Kawempe North Latif Ssebaggala Ssengendo, owa Kawempe South Mubarrak Munyagwa ssaako ne mmeeya Sserunjogi bakwate ku musaala gwabwe okumala emyezi esatu baziweeyo okuyamba okukulaakulanya munisipaali ye Kawempe.
Ebimu ku bitundu ebisinga okubeera mu mbeera embi kuliko Makerere III, Mulago, Kazo Angola, Bwaise III, ssaako ne Wandegeya.
MEEYA AYOGEDDE
Emmanuel Sserunjogi Mmeeya we Kawempe ategeezezza nti kituufu Kawempe mucaafu naye ensonga eva ku bikozesebwa okubeera ebitono mu kitongole kya KCCA ssaako n'abantu obutafaayo mu kweyonja ne baagalanga okulinda abakulembeze baabwe.
Ayongedddeko nti waliwo abantu abamu abakwata kasasiro ne bamusuula mu myala nga bakigenderedde era nga bino bye bimu ku bintu ebisinga okusaasaanya obucaafu.

Ssenga ndi mukazi naye ndabika ndiko ekikyamu kuba sirina musajja ambiita. Ssenga nnyamba. SN e Nateete
Mwana wange bakyala bangi balina ekizibu kino. Naye kye tulina okumanya abasajja batono ku bakyala kale embeera eno tulina ogibeeramu. Ekirala nga bwe tuli abatono olina okulaba nga weefaako okufuna omusajja. Genda mu bifo w'osobola okukola omukwano n'abasajja kyokka nga weegendereza obutakwatibwa bulwadde
bwa Covid-19. Ekirala weefeeko olabike bulungi. Olina okubeera mu mbeera ekusobozesa okufuna abasajja, bw'osigala awaka buli kiseera kizibu omusajja okukusanga. N'ekirala mwana wange oluusi tetufuna basajja olw'empisa ze tulina. Abasajja ennaku zino bamanyi enjawulo y'omukyala n'omukazi.
Kale weeyise ng'omukyala osoboole okufuna omusajja. Ekirala tolina kweyisa mu ngeri eyinza okutiisa abasajja okukugambako.

Bya Joanita Nakatte
Entiisa yabuutikidde abatuuze b'e Bajjo mu munisipaali y'e Mukono ku Lwokubiri oluvannyuma lwa laddu okukuba abantu babiri ababadde bakolera mu kirombe kya bbuloka mu kitundu kino omu n'afiirawo, ate omulala n'atwalibwa mu ddwaaliro ng'ali bubi.
Eyafudde ye Christopher Ssebadduka, omutuuze ku kyalo kawuga mu munisipaali eno abadde akola nga ssentebe w'ekirombe kino, era ng'omu ku baabaddewo Nicholas Mubiru, yannyonnyodde ng'omugenzi bwe yabadde atetenkanya okukweka enkumbi ye mu lukubakuba olwabadde lufuuyirira era ng'eyo laddu gye yamusanze n'emukuba n'akalirawo.
"Nabadde mu kayumba nga neggamye wabula amaaso nga ngatunuulizza gye baabadde beekukumye, eggulu bwe lyabwatuse nagenze okwetegereza nga be mbadde ndaba sikyabalaba kwe kugamba be nabadde nabo nti waliwo ekikyamu ekituuse ku ba Ssebadduka," Mubiru bwe yategeezezza.
Agamba nti, amangu ago beetegerezza mu kifo we baabadde ng'omusenyu gusituse mu bbanga kyokka nga wanyooka n'omukka era baagenze okubatuukako nga Ssebadduka agang'alamye mu kitaba ky'omusaayi kubanga laddu yabadde emukubidde ddala mu liiso ate omulala gwe yabadde naye ataategeerekese mannya nga yabadde abikka bulooka ze, ye laddu yabadde emusudde mu kidiba ng'ataawa.
Oluvannyuma poliisi yazze n'etwala omulambo mu ddwaaliro e Kawolo okwongera okwekebejjebwa.
Omugenzi yalese abaana abato babiri ne namwandu.

Mu lutuula olwakubiriziddwa omumyuka wa sipiika, Jacob Oulanyah, lwefugiddwa okusika omuguwa ku biteeso ebiwerako.
Wiiki ewedde Palamenti yayabuka tewedde ng’ababaka baagala Pulezidenti asooke addemu ebbaluwa sipiika gye yali amuwandiikidde nga yeemulugunya ku baserikale abaatulugunya abantu.
Oulanyah yasoose kutegeeza nga bwe yabadde amaze okufuna ebbaluwa okuva ewa Pulezidenti ng’annyonnyola ensonga ababaka ze baali beemulugunyaako.

Oulanyah yasazeewo nti Sseggona yalina okulangirira nga bwe yali asazeewo okuyamba ababaka ekintu kye yakoze.

Bya Martin Ndijjo
Embeera y’obunkenke mu byokwerinda eriwo akaco kano mu ggwanga terobedde badigize kulya bulamu ku nnaku za Paasika.
Ku Easter Monday eggulo e Kiwatule, mu kitundu gye bakattira abadde omuwabi wa gavumenti Joan Kagezi, abadigize baalumbye na ‘mutima’ ekivvulu kya Bebe Cool, naye ataabatimaye n'aggunda emiziki egy’okukumu saako okubasiima olw’okumuwagira ebbanga lyonna ky’agamba nti kye kimu ku bimufudde omunene mu ggwanga.
Bebe Cool yategeezezza nga bwe yabadde afunye ebiragiro mu kiro ekyakeesezza olunaku lw’ekivvulu okukisaazamu olw’ensonga y’ebyokwerinda kyokka yasobodde okukwatagana n’ab’ebyokwerinda ne bayiwa abakuumi omwabadde abasirikale ba poliisi, poliisi y’amagye n’ab'ebitongole by’obwannannyini mu buli kanyomero munda n’ebweru olwo omuziki ne guvuga.
“Nsooka okwetonda olw’ebyo ebiyinza okuba nga tebitambudde bulungi naye okutwaliza awamu ku mulundi guno ebintu tebibadde byangu olw’embeera fenna gye tumanyi eriwo mu ggwanga era n’ekivvulu kino baabadde bandagidde nkisaazemu naye mwebale kujja,” Bebe Cool bwe yeebazizza abawagizi be.
Bebe Cool era agamba nti embeera eno ye yamulemesezza n’okuyoola ssente nga bw'atera okukola mu bivvulu by'ategeeka mu kifo kino kubanga tekyajjumbiddwa nnyo nga bwe kiteera okuba.
Ekivvulu kya Bebe Cool e Kiwaatule tekijjumbiddwa

Abakristu ba St. Balikuddembe Buloba Catholic Parish bajaguzza olunaku lw’amaka n’obufumbo mwebaddiddemu okukuba ebiragaano by’okunyweza omukwano gwabwe ng’abafumbo.
Batandise n’ekitambiro ky’Emmisa ekulembeddwamu omukwananya w’okuyitibwa okwenjawulo mu Ssaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala Rev Fr. Dr. Joseph Sseruga, ng’ayambibwako akulira ekitongole ky’obafumbo mu kigo ky’e Buloba Rev Fr. Edward Bwanika.
Rev Fr. Dr. Sseruga asabye abafumbo okusoosowaza omukwano gwabwe, n’okunywerera ku biragaano byebaakuba bwebaali bagattibwa mu bufumbo obutukuvu.
Wakati mu Kitambiro kya Mmisa abafumbo okubadde ne muweereza munnaffe ku CBS Bakulumpagi Jackson (Dr Kwefu) mu lujjudde lw’ekibiina ekikungaanye bazzeemu okulagaana okunywerera awamu okutuusa okufa.
Abafumbo ba Parish eno eye Buloba bakulembeddwa ba Ssaabafumbo nebannaabafumbo okuva mu bisomesa byonna ebikola ekigo ekyo.
Ku bisomesa kuliko; Bulenga Kikaaya, Bwotansimbi, Bukasa-Bukulu, Ssumbwe, Kalambi, Nakabugo ne St. Kizito.
Nnaabafumbo wa Parish Annett Sseruuma Katende agambye nti olunaku luno balukuza buli mwaka, okwezza obuggya n’okusikiriza abakyali mu bufumbo obw’ensonga okufuna ekinyegenyege nabo okwetwalira obufumbo obutukuvu.
Oluvannyuma basaze kkeeki eyabaweereddwa omu ku bannaabwe owa Anns Investment e Bulenga.

Bya Ssemakula John
Buddu
Minisitule ya gavumenti ez’ebitundu mu Buganda awamu n’ekitongole kya Buganda Land Board (BLB), babangudde abaami ba Kabaka n’abamyuka baabwe ku ngeri gye basobola okweyambisaamu ettaka awamu n’okulitaasa ku baagala okulibba.
Enteekateeka eno ezingiddemu abaami okuva mu masaza okuli; Buddu, Ssese, Mawogola, Kabula ne Kkooki ng’omusomo guno guyindidde ku Maria Floor Hotel e Buddu nga gwetabiddwamu ne Minisita omubeezi owa gavumenti ez’ebitundu, Joseph Kawuki.
Mu kwogerako
... 
isobola okuyimirizaawo ebitundu byabwe wamu n’Obwakabaka, mu kifo ky’okulireka okutwalibwa abasatuusi.
Ono yatenderezza emirimu egikolebwa ekitongole kya Buganda Land Board era n’asaba abaami b’amagombolola awamu n’abaamasaza okukolaganira awamu okusobola okutwala Buganda ku ntikko.
Owek. Kawuki era yalambuludde ku mivuyo egiri ku ttaka naddala mu bitundu bya Buganda era n’awabula gavumenti okukimanya nti mayiro si y’ereeta emivuyo era n’akakasa nti Buganda Land Board eriwo mu mateeka kuba buli 
...
wa nnyo mu kiseera kino eky’okutumbula empeereza n’okunyweza enkolagana wakati y’ebitongole by’Obwakabaka byonna.
Ono yasekeredde abalowooza nti ekitongole kya Buganda Land Board tekiri mu mateeka nti bakomye okusaaga kuba ebiwandiiko weebiri ebikakasa nti eri mu mateeka.
Abaami ab’amagombolola n’amasaza abeetabye mu musomo guno abaakulembeddwamu Ssaabaddu okuva mu ssaza ly’e Ssese, omwami Nalunga Bunjazi, baagambye nti omusomo guno gwabagasseeko kinene era ne bawera okukuuma ettaka lya Buganda.

EMYALA egitwala mukoka ku nguudo eziyunga ku mwala gwa Lufuka ku luguudo lw'e Ntebe, gitandise okusibibwa amayinja.
Kino kyongedde okuwa essuubi eri abatuuze mu byalo ebyotoolooddewo omuli Nankinga, Lufuka Bunnanwaya n'ebirla ku kukendeera kw'amazzi agabadde ganjaala buli nkuba lw'ebadde etonnya.
Ssaalongo Musoke ssentebe wa Lufuka - Bunnanwaya yagambye nti, waluwo essuubi ly'okuwona amazzi agabadde gayingirira amayumba g'abatuuze.
Ate Edward Gabula avunaanyizibwa ku nteekateeka y'okukola enguudo eziyunga ebintuntu mu minisitule y'ebyenguudo n'entambula yagambye nti, a essira basinze kulissa ku myala kuba y'ensibuko y'okwonooneka kw'enguudo mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo.

Takisi nnamba UAV 545J y’erudde ng’abasaabaze bagyemulugunyaako ng’emisango bazze bagiroopa ku poliisi ezenjawulo.
Omwezi oguwedde Kizza Sserwadda 32, ow’e Makerere Kavule yaddukira ku poliisi y’oku Kaleerwe n’aggulawo omusango ku fayiro nnamba SD REF:36/12/9/2019.
Sserwadda yategeeza nti yalinnya takisi eno mu September ku luguudo oludda e Gayaza ne bamubbako 1200,000/.
Mu kukwata takisi omugoba waayo eyategeerekeseeko erya Ronald yadduka abaserikale ne balagira nnannyini yo Abdallah Kasujja okumukwata.
Kasujja yakwata Ronald n’amukwasa poliisi y’oku Kaleerwe n’akkiriza okusasula Sserwadda, ne bamuta.
Kyokka ku Lwokusatu poliisi ya CPS yazzeemu okukwata takisi eno ku nsonga y’emu Ronald n’adduka.
Kasujja yategeezezza nti bannanyini mmotoka tebalina buzibu wabula be baziwa, n’asaba poliisi ku luno emuwe emmotoka ye kuba omusibe yamukwata ate bo ne bamuta.

Yasalawo kutamiira byabufuzi, Ababaka ba Palamanti nabo bataamira nebaggyawo ekkomo ku myaka n’ebisanja ekitufuukidde ekizibu. Neebaza nnyo Mw. John Baptist Nambeshe (Omubaka wa Manjiya county, mu Disitulikiti y’e Bududa) okuyimirira ku lw’abantu.”

Kajubi 85, yafiiridde mu kinaabiro ku Lwokubiri bwe yasirittuse n'akuba omutwe ku kisenge mu makaage e Bugoloobi mu Kampala.

... 
mwongerayo e Mulago kyokka n'afa nga bamutwala.

Nakato yagasseeko nti mu kiseera kino bakyalinda alipoota okuva ew'omusawo eyamukozeeko okusobola okuzuula ekyaviiriddeko obuzibu buno.

...
ku bbiri okusobola okusalawo ku by'okuziika.

Mu kiseera kino abantu ab'ebiti eby'enjawulo bagenda mu maka g'omugenzi e okusobola okukubagiza ab'enganda nga n'omulabirizi wa Namirembe Cathederal Rt Rev. Wilberforce Kityo Luwalira ye yakulembeddemu okusaba n'okugumya abakungubazi.

Bakansala b’e Makindye Batabukidde Sipiika Among, Bamusabye Yeetondere Obuganda
Bakansala b’eggombolola ye Makindye batabukidde omukubiriza w’olukiiko lw’eggwanga Annet Anita Among nebamusaba yeetondere Obuganda olw’okubuyisaamu olugaayu n’okwogera ebigambo ebisosola mu mawanga. Bano bagamba nti effujjo lingi erizze likolebwa ku Buganda nebasirika nga ky’ekiseera baggyeyo enjala okwanganga abavvoola n’okutyoboola Buganda. Bano okwogera bino babadde mu lutuula okuyisa embalirira y'Omwaka 2025/2026 era babadde beesibye ebimyu.

Abasomesa basabiddwa okwetegerezanga abaana be basomesa basobole okulaba abatulugunyizibwa mu maka gye babeera n’abalabika okuba nga bayita mu bulamu obw’okugezebwa ebiyinza okubalemesa okuyiga obulungi.
Juliet Sseggujja omusomesa akola ku nsonga z’abaana mu limu ku matabi ga Kids Club Kampala ekimu ku bitongole by’obwannakyewa ekibudaabuda abaana abayita mu kugezesebwa erya Katanga Resource Center agamba nti okuyiga kw’abaana kuddizibwa nnyo emabega ebiriwoozo by’obweraliikirivu ebibabeera mu bwongo bwatyo n’asaba abasomesa okufangayo ennyo okwetegereza abaana be basomesa bano babudaabudibwe nga tebanneekyawa kuva mu masomero.
Alipoota y’ekitongole ky’ensonga z’ebyabaana ekya UNICEF yalaga nti abaana basatu ku bana mu ggwanga wano baali batulugunyiziddwako mu ngeri emu oba endala.

Lord mayor wa Kampala Ssalongo Erias Lukwago agambye nti ebizibu ebikosa bannakampala bivudde ku mateeka ag’ekimpatiira agayisibwa, nga tegasoose kunoonyerezebwako.
Lukwago abadde mu lutuula lwa KCCA olwenjawulo olubadde ku City Hall mu Kampala, okwanjula embeera bweyimiridde mu Kibuga Kampala,kati omwaka mulamba kasookeddenga balondebwa nebatandika okuweereza bannakampala.
Olutuula luno olwatuumwa State of Kampala Capital City Affairs address, lwetabiddwamu abakulembeze abenjawulo ku mitendera 
... 
itongole kya KCCA.
Lukwago era ayagala wabeewo okunoonyereza ku ensimbi ezaakozesebwa okukola oluguudo lwe Lukuli Konge ne Acacia avenue, nti zasaasaanyizibwako ensimbi nkumu.
Agambye nti zakolebwa ku buvujjirizi bwa World bank, wabula nga buli kilometre y’oluguudo yatwala obuwumbi bwa shs 10.
Mu ngeri yeemu Lukwago agambye nti ekibuga kikyalina obuzibu bwa kasasiro, olw’obutaba na bimmotoka bimala okumuyoola.
KCCA erina ebimmotoka 19 byokka, wabula nga kuliko ebiramu 12 ebisigadde byafuuka miga
...
 Mayor byayogeddeko birungi era námusaba okukomya okubiteekamu ebyobufuzi naye batuule wamu bateekereteekere ekibuga.
Bamayor bamagombolola nabo bagambye nti wadde bawezezza omwaka mulamba mu wofiisi kasookanga balondebwa, nti naye sibasanyufu kubanga tebayina buyinza, so nga baakola enteekateeka nnyingi okuweereza abantu babwe.
Ye speaker wa City Hall Zahara Maala Luyirika ne Luyombya Godfrey bagambye nti nabo omwaka gwebamaze mu wofiisi banyigiriziddwa nnyo, kubanga n’omusaala tebakyabasasula.

Embeera ye Ebola e Kassanda ekyeralikiriza
Bya Barbara Nalweyiso ne Juliet Nalwoga,
Minisita w’ebyobulamu Dr. Jane Ruth Aceng alaze nti kiyinza okutwala wiiki endala bbiri oba ssatu okutebenkeza Kassanda kuba y’esinze okukosebwa ekirwadde kya Ebola.
Bwabadde asisinkanye abakulembeze mu disitulikiti eno akawungeezi ka leero, Dr, Aceng agambye nti mu ssaawa 24 olunaku lw’eggulo abalwadde ba Ebola 12 bebafunise era abatuuze 457 bebakwataganako nabo baalondoolebwa.
Agamba nti kati beetaaga okuteekawo ekifo ekijjanjaba ekirwadde kya Ebola okuweereza ebyalo okuli Kalanwa ne Kiganda mu DISTRICT y’e Kassanda obulwadde gye businga okuwulirwa.
Abalwadde okuva e Kassanda n’okutuusa kati babadde batwalibwa mu disitulikiti y’e Mubende okufuna obujanjabi.
Agamba nti era baasazeewo okwongera ku muwendo gw’abakugu abeetegereza endwadde enkambwe mu kitundu kino okuva ku 7 abaliwo okutuuka waakiri ku 15.

basuubuzi mu katale baasaasaana buli omu yakwata lirye ng’abaliwo abatono omuliro gwabaleka mu bbanga.
“Twasooka ne tusasula obukadde 350 ng’omuliro tegunnaba kutwokya era kati batubanja obukadde 650 zokka. Twali tusasula bulungi naye omuliro ogutwokezza emirundi ebiri gwatukomya nga kati buli omu yakwata lirye. Abasuubuzi abawera 2300 abeewola ssente simanyi gye bali ate ng’omusingo gw’emidaala gyonna gyasaanawo,” Lubega bwe yagambye.
Yategeezezza nti baawandiikidde Pulezidenti Museveni nga bam
...
. Yasooka kubawa obukadde 200 nga September 01, 2009, n’addako obukadde 400 nga November 26, 2009, n’obukadde obulala 400 ne babubawa nga July 23, 2010.
Ebbaluwa egamba nti baasasulako obukadde 350 kati bbanka ebanja obukadde 653 era buli eyaziryaako ayitiddwa mu kkooti yennyonnyoleko oba okumusalira omusango nga taliiwo ayiggibwe.
Ebbaluwa egamba nti ekibiina ky’abasuubuzi kyakola ng’omusingo okuggyayo ssente zino era nga bamaze okuzisasula bagenda kugattako endala eza balooya obukadde mukaaga.

Amawulire
Omubiri gw’abadde Minisita Engola gutikiddwa ku nnyonyi egututte ku butaka gyabadde azaarwa
Bya Ritah Kemigisa. Omubiri gw’abadde Minister w’eby’abakozi Charles Okello Engola gutikiddwa ku nyonyi egitudde mu district ye Oyam ono gy’abadde asibuka, okukola emikolo egisembayo nga tannaba kuziikibwa ku lunaku lw’omukaaga olwa sabiiti eno.
Minister Engola yakubwa omukuumi we amasasi agamuttirawo omukuumi we Wilson Sabiiti ku lunaku lw’okubiri lwa sabiiti ewedde mu maka ge e Kyanja.
Oluvany
... 
kubye amasasi gamujja mu bulamu bw’ensi ekyaviirako n’eggye ly’eggwanga okumasalira omusango ogw’obutamuziika mu bitiibwa ng’omujaasi wabwe afiiridde mu buweereza olw’ekikorwa kye kyebagamba nti kyali kimenya mateeka.
Okusinziira ku w’oluganda lw’omugenzi Sam Engola, abadde ku kisaawe e Kololo ng’omubiri gwono gutikkibwa, atubuulidde nti ennyoni ekika kya namunkanga yakugwa ku kisaawe kya Lira Secondary School n’oluvanyuma bagutwale mu kisenge awatuula abakiise ba district ye Oyam abaayo ogukuba
...
 Engola y’abadde omubaka wa Oyam North mu Parliament ku ticket y’ekibiina ekiri mu bukulembeze.
Sam Engola ategeezezza nga bwebasuubira ekiteeso okuletebwa mu lutuula lwa council ya Oyam okutuuma olumu ku nguudo wamu ne gavumenti okuzimba essomero ebibulemu elinnya ly’omugenzi, olw’ebirungi byakoledde ekitundu ekyo.
Kyategerekese nti Omugenzi Engola, abaddeko n’ekkanisa gagadde gyazimba era ng’ebade enatera okumalirizibwa.
Engola wakuzikibwa ku lunaku olw’omukaaga mu district eye Oyam gyazaalwa.

MARIA NNYAFFE by W. F.; Harm: Leonard B. Kizza
Maria nnyaffe otuyambe, ennaku zitusanze otuwolereze,
ennaku zitusanze otuwolereze.
- Tuzze gy’oli ayi Bikia Nnyaffe, tuvvunamye ffena mu maaso go.
Tega okutu, muwolereza waffe, owulire essaala z’abaana bo. - Laba ebyalo biweddemu abantu, n’enju nnyingi leero bifulukwa.
Tuwulira ebiwoobe n’enduulu, tunaddawa Ggwe bwot’otuyamba. - Twayonoona ggwe wamma gutusinze, naye leero tumenyese emyoyo. Ggyamaaso go ku bibib byetukyaye, tusaasire ng’oggya mukisa kyo.
- Ayi Mukama watutonda ggwe nnyini n’otubumba ffenna n’engalo zo. Werabirenga bwetuli abonoonyi, n’ojjukira nga tulibaana bo.
- Oba ogaya amaziga ge tukaaba, omwana wo ye atuwanjagira.
Tunuulra ku biwundu bya Yezu, n’otogaana kusaasira bantu.
- Ayi Mukama Ggwe Omutonzi wa byonna, by’olagira biwulira mangu. Obulwadde bujja okumala abantu, bu komeko ffenna tunawona.

Omusajja atabukidde muganzi we okuleeta omusiguze mu nnyumba mu bitundu bye Kyebando mu Kampala.
Omusajja ategerekeseeko erya Mike ng’avuga Takisi agamba nti akawungeezi k’olunnaku olw’eggulo ku Lwokusatu yafunye omulimu ng’alina okutwala abantu mu bitundu bye Semuto, Nakaseke nga yabadde alina okusulayo.
Ku ssaawa 1 ey’akawungeezi, Mike yakubidde mukyala we essimu, okumutegezaako nga bw’atagenda kudda waka.
Wabula ku ssaawa nga 2 ez’ekiro, Mike agamba nti yafunye okulumizibwa mu lubuto n’omutwe nga tasobola bulungi kuvuga mmotoka, okutwala abantu e Semuto.
Yafunye mukwano gwe, okutwala abantu ng’alina okudda awaka okuwumula.
Okutuuka awaka ku ssaawa nga 4 ez’ekiro, nga mukyala we, ali mu kusinda mukwano n’omusajja omulala omusiguze.
Mike agamba nti mu kusooka, omukyala yabadde atidde okuggulawo oluggi era yasobodde okuyamba omusiguze okudduka ng’ayita mu mulyango gwe manju.
Wakati mu kulwanagana Mike n’omukyala, neyiba yakubye enduulu eyasombodde abatuuze okutaasa embeera era omukyala yataasiddwa nga yenna atonnya musaayi mu kamwa.
Wadde balina abaana 2 okuli myaka 4 ne 2, Mike yagobye omukyala era wakati mu kulukusa amaziga, agamba nti tayinza kudda mu makaage.

Bya Elisa Nicholas Ssekitende
Omwami wa Kabaka avunaanyizibwa ku Nzirukanya y’emirimu gy’obwakabaka mu Ssaza Kooki Ow’ekitiibwa Getrude Nakalanzi Ssebuggwaawo, ataamidde Abakiise b’olukiiko lw’e Ssaza lino, olw’obutatuukiriza bulungi Buvunaanyizibwa bwaabwe.
Ow’ekitiibwa Ssebuggwaawo asinzidde mu Lukiiko lw’e Ssaza olutudde e Lumbugu mu Ggombolola ya Mumyuka Lwanda e Kooki mu Rakai, n’ategeeza ng’abaweereza bwebalina okumanya kyebagala ekyabalondesa okuweereza Kabaka waabwe, nga nabwekityo Balina Okwewaayo okuweereza awatali kwekwasa Nsonga yonna.
Ono awadde ekiragiro, eri abaami ba Magombolola, ba Mmemba ba Executive n’abakulira ebitongole okuwaayo Alipoota kubyebakoze n’enteekateeka zebalina, obutasukka Nnaku za Mwezi 15 Omwezi ogujja ogw’okuna. Abajjukiza era n’abakalaatira kuky’okutuuzanga enkiiko okuviira ddala ku Ssaza, Amagombolola n’emiruka okutuukira Ddala ku Batongole ku Byalo, era nga balina okuwuliziganyanga, Okwebuuza n’okuwanga amawulire Amatuufu era n’ensonga ezeekennenyezeddwa Obulungi.

Amawulire
Minisitule eyébyénjigiriza efulumiza ebinagobererwa ngámasomero gagguddwa
Bya Prossy Kisakye,
Minisitule eye byenjigiriza nébyemizannyo evudeyo nenteekateeka enegobererwa singa amasomero ganagulawo.
Bwabadde ayogerako ne bannamawulire mu Kampala omwogezi wa minisitule eno Dr Dennis Mugimba agambye nti bavudeyo nentekateeka eno nga bwebalinda omukulembeze weggwanga okuvaayo nennaku entuufu abayizi kwebanadira mu masomero.
Mugimba, anyonyodde nti munsisinkano gyebabademu ne pulezidenti kuntandikwa ya ssabiiti eno baamutegeeza nti amasomero galigudewo mu mwezi ogujja mu mitendera nga bwekyali mu muyaga ogwasooka ogwekirwadde kya covid-19.
Ono agamba nti mu kugulawo amasomero okulungi Bagala abayizi ku mulundi guno basome nnaku nakku nga okugeza aba P1,P2, ne P3 bwebagya ku bbalaza ne lwokubiri ate nga abebibiina ebirala basoma kunnaku endala.
Minisitule era egamba nti ku mulundi guno abayizi tebagendanga kusoma bbanga mpavu nga bwegwali nga ekirwadde tekinazinda ggwanga, taamu zakuba nyimpi
Mugimba era agambye nti ne kaliculamu bagenda gifunza balondemu ebintu ebikulu byonna byebaba basomesa abayizi.
Wabula kinajukirwa nti abakulu mu minisitule na bakakiiko akalwanyisa ekirwadde kya covid bwebatuula ne Museveni yagaana ekyabayizi okudda ku somero mu mwezi ogujja nga agamba nti waliwo bingi bye balina okusooka okwetegereza.

Ebitongole byokwerinda mu bitundu bye Kasangati ne Masooli mu disitulikiti y’e Wakiso bikoze ekikwekweeto mwekwatidde abantu 49, abagambibwa nti baludde nga benyigira mu kumenya amateeka n’okusabbalaza abasajja.
Ku bakwate kuliko abakyala 8.
Abatuuze mu kitundu, baludde nga bemulugunya ku
– Bbaala, okubalemesa okwebaka nga bawoganya endoogo
– Okutumbula obuseegu nga bawandiisa abaana abato okuzina ekimansulo
– Ebbaala okusembeza abazzi b’emisango okuwumulirayo
Ekikwekweeto kyakoleddwa ku
– Kasambya Chapa – Kasubi
– Mu Katawuni e Kiwenda
– Busukuma n’ebitundu ebirala.
Luke Owoyesigyire, amyuka omwogezi wa Poliisi mu Kampala n’emirirwano, agamba nti abakwate baguddwako emisango 2 omuli
– Okweyisa ng’ekitagasa
– Okwenyigira mu kumenya amateeka
Mungeri y’emu Poliisi ewanjagidde abatuuze abalina amawulire agayinza okubayamba okukwata abantu bonna abaludde nga benyigira mu kuzza emisango, okulaba nga bakwatibwa.
Ebirala ebifa mu ggwanga – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qfz7EhDrRUc&t=1s

ye aliba kabaka we, kubanga baagaana okudda.

Bya EDWARD SSERINNYA
RONALD Mayinja annyonnyodde engeri munnaabwe Geoffrey Lutaaya gye yakakanyadde omutima n’alemesa kaweefube yenna gwe babadde bataddewo ow’okutumbula ekibiina kyabwe nga bonna bali wamu.
“We tubadde tutuuse, tubadde tulina okukyusa mu nkola yaffe nga muno mulimu okwezza obweggya ng’ekibiina, omwajjidde n’okukyusa erinnya era nga tulina n’okwongera ku badayirekita nga kitegeeza n’okukyusa mu nsasula.
Ffenna abana twabikkiriza, ye Lutaaya n’akalambira ng’ayagala omutemwa gwe gu
... 
tufuna.
Wadde nga yabadde tagenda kuyimbanga, Lutaaya yalemedde ku kusigala ng’afuna omutemwa gwe omukadde, nti ye tayagala kumanya mbu ate baalonze badayirekita abapya, simanyi mbu bakonjobole ku nsimbi ze okubasasula!
Wadde okusalawo kwe yali ndowooza ye, naye kyalabika nga si kya bwenkanya kuba olwo tuba nga tugenda okumusasula ssente z’atakolerera, naye ate naffe ne tulaba nga si kya bwesimbu okusigala nga tukozesa Eagles ya Lutaaya gye yatuuyaanira okukola ssente z’atafunako, nga tujja kula
...
ulwa ensimbi ennyingi, babadde batandise okulengezza emirimu gy’ekibiina kuba babadde bagiraba ng’egitafuna.
Wabula kati badayirekita bonna abaalondeddwa bamanyi ensimbi ze balina okufuna, ekibakakatako kwe kukola ensimbi ne zibaawo. Era mu mbeera eno, 40 ku 100 ssente ze tukola zigenda kusigalangawo okumaliriza ebigwa tebiraze.
Baakutandika okukola ebivvulu bya Golden Productions ku paasika era nga bajja kubeera Nansana ate enkeera bagende e Bweyogerere.
‘Lutaaya mukakanyavu wa mutima’- Mayinja

Abagoberezi ba kristu mu masinzizo ag’enjawulo basabidde Ssaabasajja Kabaka n’okwebaza Katonda olw’obulamu bw’amuwadde kati emyaka 68.
Ssaabasumba Paul Ssemogerere yakulembeddemu ekitambiro ky’emissa eky’okukuza amazuukira ga Yezu Kristu ku lutikko e Lubaga, ekyetabiddwamu Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga.
Ssaabasumba asabye abakkiriza bonna beebaze Omutonzi olwóbulamu bwa Ssabasajja Kabaka era omwogere okumuwa ebirungi
Era Yebazizza Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okukulemberamu omumuli gw’okukubiriza abantu naddala abasajja okwewala siriimu.
Ssaabasumba mu ngeri ey’enjawulo asabye abantu bonna okulwanyisa obuli bw’enguzi n’obulyake, n’agamba nti ensi yattu Uganda ejjudde obuswavu, olw’abantu abeebitiibwa ate ababba ebintu by’abawejjere.
Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga bwábadde yetabye mukitambiro kyémisa ekyamazukira ga Yezu Kristu , asabye buli muntu okwenyigira mulutalo olwókulwanyisa akawuka kamukenenya.
Mu ngeri yemu Katikkiro asabye banna Uganda buli omu okulwana okulwanyisa obulyake enguzi n’obubbi obusukiridde mu ggwanga bwagambye nti bwongedde okufuya eggwanga.
Minister w’ebyenjigiriza ebisookebwaako Jc Muyingo ngéra yakiikiridde Government eyawakati agambye nti beetegefu okulwanyisa obubbi nóbulyake mu ggwanga, nga bakozesa enkola ez’enjawulo.
Ssabakristu Ivan Kalanzi Alozius asabye Government okuwa ekitiibwa enkola yébibiina ebingi baleme kutulugunyanga baludda olugibuganya.#

Omuvubuka Ibrahim Musana myaka 27 amanyiddwa nga Pressure 24 Seven abadde akozesa omutimbagano naddala ogwa Tiktok okuvvoola Ssaabasajja Kabaka, asomeddwa emisango 8 gyeyegaanye n’asindikibwa ku alimanda okutuusa nga 07 March ,2024.
Pressure asimbiddwa mu maaso g’omulamuzi wa kooti ya Buganda Road Ronald Kayizzi, n’amusomera emisango omuli okusiga obukyayi,okukozesa obubi computer n’emirala.
Oludda oluwaabi nga lukulembeddwamu Joan Keko lutegeezezza omulamuzi nti wakati wa August 2023 ne Februar
... 
2024, Pressure ng’ayita ku mukutu gwe ogwa TikTock abadde avvoola Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi 11 , President Museveni , Sipiika wa parliament Annet Anita Among, minister omubeezi ow’ebyempuliziganya Joyce Naboosa Ssebugwawo n’abalala.
Musana agambye nti yali tamanyi nti ebikolwa bye bivvoola Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka.
Agambye mbu emizimu gya ba ssekabaka gimusumbuwa okuteereza amasiro ,kyokka awandiikidde mengo ebbaluwa teziddamu.
Agambye alina obuzibu ku bwongo era yali yatwalibw
...
o n’e Butabika mu ddwaliro ly’abalwadde b’emitwe.
Annyonyodde mbu atawaanyizibwa empewo za Buganda omuli za ba Ssekabaka ba Buganda nti abamulinnya ku mutwe nga bamulagira okumaliriza amasiro gabwe.
Yegayiridde kooti emusonyiwe n’asuubiza obutaddamu kuvvoola bantu, era nti wakusiimuulayo obutambi bwonna obubavvoola okuva ku TikTok.
Omulamuzi amusindise ku alimanda okutuusa nga 07 March,2024 lwanadda mu kooti ng’aleese n’abantu abamweyimirira abalimu omuzinzi n’ebisaanyizo.

ABAZADDE bawakannyiza eky’ekibiina kya A4C okwekalakaasa enkya nga batambuza ebigere kye bagamba nti kigenda kutataaganya abayizi abatandika ebibuuzo byabwe eby’akamalirizo.
Bawandiikidde Ssaabadumizi wa poliisi Maj. Gen Kale Kayihura nga bamusaba akozese amaanyi gonna agasoboka okulemesa bannabyabufuzi b’oludda oluvuganya gavumenti okugenda mu maaso n’enteekateeka zaabwe.
Baabadde ku National Theatre ku Lwomukaaga nga bakulembeddwaamu ssentebe w’ekibiina kya Parents Brigade, Edgar Barigye.

Olwali
Peter Schmeichel amazina gamutabula
MANCHESTER
Newankubadde asinga kumanyibwa lwa kukwatira Man United ggoolo mu gy’e 1990, Peter Schmeichel , 49, yalaze nti alina ttalanta eziwerako.
Schmeichel y’omu ku baalondeddwa okwetaba mu mpaka z’amazina ezitegekebwa Man United era nga ziyitibwa ‘Dancing with United’, era Gary Neville agenda kubeera omu ku balamuzi.
Gye buvuddeko Schmeichel yeetaba mu mpaka za ‘Strictly Come Dancing’ kyokka yamalira mu kyamusanvu nga Fabrice Muamba amulaze ttaaci, naye ku luno yeewera nti banaawulira akamufaamu. Abalala abagenda okuzeetabamu kuliko Quinton Fortune, Ulrika Jonsson, Antony Cotton, Jennie McAlpine ne Camilla Dallerup agenda okuzina ne Schmeichel.

Okutandika ne 8 May 2018, emikutu gya Baganda BugandaWatch gyelinako obukwaate gibadde gitambuuza obubaka obumanyisa bannamikutu nga Abanyarwanda bwebagudde olutalo ku Baganda nga batandise na kuwamba omuvubuka wa Baganda Nkoba za Mbogo (BANKOSA), ayitibwa Omulongo Ibrah Wasswa Semanda, nebamuteeka mu buutu y’emotoka nga bwegwaalinga ku mirembe gya Idi Amin.
Wansi, bwebubaka mu bujjuvu:
ABANYARWANDA BAGUDDEWO OLUTALO KU BAGANDA – Nga 7 May 2018, ku saawa 6 ezemisana, abasajja abannyarwanda 3 abali mu ngoye ezabulijjo bawambye omuvubuka wa Nkobazambogo, Omulongo Ibrah Wasswa Semanda, nebamukasuka mu buutu y’emotoka okutali nnamba. Nga bamaze okumutulugunya (nga bogera Runyarwanda), abawambi batuute Wasswa ku police y’oku Saawa ya Kwiini era nebalagira asibwe, mbu olw’okwogera obubi ku ggwanga lya Banyarwanda ngali ku mulimu gyakolera, okumpi ne police eno. Okusinziira kw’akulira police eno, Sylvia Mitume, abawambi bavudde mu majje agakuuma president Museveni era nga bakulembeddwa omusajja ayitibwa Gumisiriza. TAMBUZA OBUBAKA BUNO MU BAGANDA WONNA – Zambogo

Ab’omuliro bafunye obuyambi-abalala balinze mirambo
Gavt etuukirizza ekisuubizo kyokuliyirira abo abajiiride mumuliro e namungoona oluvanyuma lwekimotoka kyamafuta okwabika.
Abantu 13 bebakafuna obukadde 5 kwaabo 52 abalina okuliyirirwa ensimbi zino.
Omukungu okuva mu maka gomukulembeze weggwanga Ruth Nakyobe agamba abo abfiira mumuliro guno, bazadde baabwe bebagenda okuweebwa sente zino oba abenganda zaabwe abalala.
Eddwaliro ly’emulago elikola ku muliro lyetaaga obukadde 100 okujjanjaba omuntu omu mu saabiiti emu yokka
Okusinziira w’akulira eddwaliro lino Robert Ssentongo, eddagala lyebakozesa ku b’omuliro lya beeyi nnyo nga n’abakozi beebalina batono ddala.
Ono owkogera bino abadde alambudde abantu abakoseddwa omuliro e Namungoona abali mu kujjanjabibwa emulago
Mulago Hospital Burns Unit requires upto 100m Ono agambye nti beetaga abasawo abayambako abali wakati w’abana n’omunaana buli lunaku naye nga kati tebaliiwo.
Dr Ssentongo kyokka era yeeralikiriddde
Yye akulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti Nandala Mafaabi naye akyalidde ku bantu bano n’asuubiz aowkongerayo omulanga gwa Dr Sentongo gw’okwongera ku nsimbi eziweebwa eddwlairo ly’omuliro
Mafaabi era asabye Dr Ssentongo okussa okusaba kwaabwe mu butongole mu saabiti emu kuteesebweeko mu palamenti
Ebyo nga bili bityo, kyadaaki ab’enganda abalwanirira omulambo bakkiriziganyizza okugulekayo.
Omukyala obwedda alumiriza nga bw’amanyi ebigere bya bba, Joseph Ntale kyokka ng’abe waabwe bawakana

Ekitundu kye Kigezi mu bukiika ddyo bwa Uganda kizuuliddwa nti kyekikutte engule y’ebikolwa eby’okusobya ku baana nebabawereba ekirwadde kyamukenenya.
Okunonyereza kuno kufulumidde mu alipoota y’akakiiko k’eggwanga akalwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu ey’omulundi ogwa 26.
Alipoota eno eraga nti okunoonyereza okwakolebwa akakiiko kano, kwazuula nti mu mwaka 2023, emisango 110 egyokujjula ebitanaggya ate nebabasiiga ne siriimu gyegyaawaabwa.
District ezinokoddwaayo mu kitundu kino ekye Kigezi, ebikolwa 
... 
aaliza wamu district ye Kamuli mu Busoga yekyakutte ekisooka mu bikolwa ebyabasajja n’abakazi ba ssedduvutto abajjula ebitanaggya mu ggwanga lyonna.
District eno eye Kamuli, alipoota eraze nti emisango gy’okusobya ku baana egyawaabwa mu mwaka 2023, gyaali 174, yaddiridwa district ye Kiryandongo n’emisango 151, songa district ye Bududa emisango 142, mu district ye Budaka emisango 130 gyegyaawaabwa
Mu Buganda ,ekitundu kye Katwe mu Kampala kyekyaasinga okubaamu ebikolwa ebyokujjula ebitanaggya n’e
...
 ey’omwaka 2023, eyayoleka nti mu mwaka 2023, police yakungaanya emisango 13,144 egyokusobya ku baana, nga ku baaana abasobezebwaako mu mwaka ogwo 2023 abasinga gaali mabujje.
Akakiiko k’eggwanga akeddembe lyobuntu mu alipoota yaako era kalaze nti eky’ennaku waliwo n’emisango emirala mingi egy’okusobya ku baana egitawaabibwa eri ebitongole ebikuuma ddembe, gimalirizibwa eyo mu ngeri y’ekimpukumpuku, songa abasinga okusobya ku baana abo, ate bebabeera babalinako obuvunanyizibwa obw’okubalabirira.

ABENGANDA z’omuvubuka Deo kayemba atemera mu myaka 24 nakati bakyewunaganya engeri omwana wabwe gye yafiiridde mu kaduukulu ka Poliisi.
Kino kiddiridde Kayemba okukwatibwa police ye Butenga mu mu Disitulikiti ye Bukomansimbi nga ateberezebwa okuba nti yagula ebyuma bya solar ebibbe okuva ku ssomero lya ABC Nursery and primary.
Kigambibwa nti mu kukwatibwa abasirikale baamuteeka mukadukulu era nebamukubiramu emiggo nga kiteberezebwa okuba nti bano baafuna ebiragiro okuva ewa nnanyini ssomero bamutulugunye okutuusa nga ayogedde abantu baabadde abba nabo wabula eby’embi nayisibwa bubi nnyo era naffiira mukaddukulu.
Abadde akulira Poliisi ye Butenga Eteni Nathan kitegerekese nti akwatiddwa kubiragiro by’omuduumizi wa Poliisi mu Disitulikiti ye Bukomansimbi Sowedi Manisoor nga okunonyereza bwe kugenda mu maaso.
Omwogezi wa police mu ttundutundu lya Masaka Paul Kangave akakasizza okukwatibwa kwa Eteni wamu nabasirikale abalala babiri abenyigidde mu kikolwa ky’okutulugunya omusibe ekyamuviiriddeko okufa.
Do you have a story in your community or an opinion to share with us: Email us at editorial@watchdoguganda.com

Omwogezi wa Uganda Police Force CP Fred Enanga avuddeyo nategeeza nga bwewaliwo omwana ow’emyaka 2 mu Disitulikiti y’e Kasese envubu gweyamize oluvannyuma nemusesema nga mulamu. Paul Yiga 2 nga abeera nebazadde be e Katwe-Kabatooro Town Council mu Disitulikiti y’e Kasese okuliraana ennyanja Katwe. Kigambibwa nti envubu okumumira yabadde azannyira okumpi n’ennyanja.
Abatuuze bwebamumazeemaze nga tebamulaba ate nga balengera envubu eyolekera amazzi kwekutandika okukuba enduulu eyabuli kika, era kigambibwa nti envubu yandiba nga yawulidde oluyogaano olususse kwekusesema omwana ono.

Omukazi afiridde nsozi e Sironko
Bya Ivan Ssenabulya
Poliisi mu disitulikiti ye Sironko etandise okunonyereza kun fa yomukadde owemyaka 68, omulambo gwe ogwasangiddwa okumpi nomugga Naluki mu gombolola ye Busulani.
Omugenzi ye Naboso Florence, ngabadde mutuuze we Kasheru mu gombolola ye Zesui e Sironko.
Kitegezeddwa ngono bweyava awaka nagenda okulambula ku kizibwe we, e Busulani era abadde yabula.
Omwogezi wa poliisi mu kitundu kya Elgon, Rogers Taitika agambye nti omugenzi alabika yasirittuka nagwa okuva waggulu mu nsozi.
Poliisi etegezezza ngokunonyereza bwekugenda mu maaso.

Niki Eki Turikwega omu Baibuli?
Akatabo aka katebeekanisiibwe kukuhwera kwega eki Baibuli erikugamba aha nshonga nyingi, otwariiremu ahabw’enki nitubonabona, niki ekirikubaho aha kufa, oku turikubaasa kugira okushemererwa omu maka gaitu, n’ebindi.
ESHUURA 10
Baibuli neegamba amazima agarikukwata ahari baamaraika na baadaimoni. Ebyahangirwe ebi eby’omwoyo n’ebyabuzima? Nibabaasa kutuhwera nari kutukora kubi?
ESHUURA 11
Baingi nibagira ngu Ruhanga niwe arikureetaho okubonabona kwona okuri omu nsi. Nooteekateeka ki? Yetegyereze eki Ruhanga arikugamba ahabw’enki hariho okubonabona.

Uganda Police Force mu bitundu bya East Kyoga egudde mu kabondo kababbi ba Piki piki. Ekitongole kya Poliisi ekirwanyisa obubbi ekya Flying Squad kyakoze ekikwekweto mwekyakwatidde ababba piki piki nga bano ekibinja kyabwe kibadde kisinziira mu kibuga ky’e Soroti.
Eyakwatiddwa y’e Okiror Cosmas John, nga ono okukwayibwa kyadiridde Poliisi okukwata munne Otwa Isaac gweyaggye mu Disitulikiti y’e Lira. Ye munaabwe Okello Joshua yadduse. Bano basangiddwa ne Piki piki ezabibwa okuva e Gulu okuli nnamba; UES 402G ne UFB 550H endala zebasangiddwa nazo kuliko; UFA 268M, UEY 937T, UEX 233Y, UEW 215P, UEV 631Q, UEV 483Q, UFA 347E ne UAF 104Z.
Bano bwebabuuziddwa bategeezezza nti Okiror yabadde agula n’okutunda Piki Piki zebabbye. Poliisi egamba nti bano babadde babba Piki piki okuva mu bitundu by’e; Aswa, North Kyoga, East Kyoga ne Elgon.

Poliisi mu Kampala eremesezza ab’ekibiina ky’ebyobufuzi ekya Uganda People’s Congress okutuuza olukiiko lw’akyo olwa bannamawulire olwa buli wiiki ng’ebalanga butassa mu nkola biragiro bya minisitule y’ebyobulamu kukuziyiza ekirwadde kya coronavirus.
Abasirikale ba poliisi abakuuma ekizimbe kya Uganda House okuli ekitebe kya UPC, balemesezza ssabawandiisi w’ekibiina kino Ebil Otto wamu n’omwogezi Michael Osinde saako ne bannamawulire okugenda mu kizimbe kino.
Bano bagezezzaako n’okwagala okuyingira Uganda House mu buwaze naye nebasingibwa amaanyi.
Osinde, yategeezezza omukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network inti baabadde batuukirizza obukwakkulizo bonna naye Poliisi ya Nkrumah Road ng’eduumirwa omusirikale ategeerekeseeko nga Mugisha kirabika baabadde n’ebigendererwa ebirala okulemesa olukungaana luno.
“Ngezezaako okwogera n’omusirikale ono okumanya wa buzibu webuva naye tayannyeze,” Osinde bweyagambye.
Ono yanenyezza poliisi olw’okuyingirira eddembe lyabwe ng’eremesa olukungaana lwabwe.
Yagsseeko nti ssaabawandiisi waabwe Ebil Otto agenda kunonyereza okuzuula ani yawadde ebirgiro by’okusattulula olukiiko lwabwe mwebabadde bagenda okuweera enteekateeka yaabwe ey’okwetaba mu kalulu ka 2021.
Omwogezi wa poliisi wa Kampala n’emirirwano Luke Oweyesigire yaganye okubaako nekyayogera nga agamba baabadde tebannamutegeeza lwaki olukungaana luno lwasaziddwamu.

Amawulire
Kabaka anjagala awedde
Kampala capital city authority emalirizza enteekateeka z’okukola oluguudo lwa Kabaka Njagala.
Oluguudo luno oluweza milo ennamba lukulu mu Buganda nga lugatta twekobe ku kitebe ky’obufuzi ekye Mengo Bulange.
Oluguudo luno kati lwakutabuza emmotoka 2 omulundi gumu era ng’emiti gyakusimbibwa ku mabbali ne wakati okululeka nga luyooyoote.
Emiti egiliko gyobnna gyakutemebwaako emipya egigenda okusimbibwa ab’ebika nga gino era gigenda kufuuka kya bulambuzi
Katikkiro wa Buganda Owe Eng JB Walusimbi asabye abantu abali ku luguudo luno omulimu gutandike bulungi era nga kkampuni ya Sterling y’eopatanye omulimu guno ku buwumbi bwa shs 45.
Mu nguudo endala ezigenda okukolebwa kuliko, kalinda road ne Ssekabaka kintu road

Gavumenti erabudde abasomesa abediimye
Bya Benjamin Jumbe
Gavumenti ekawangumudde nti tewali nsimbi abasomesa, zebabanja, era babalagidde baddeyo ku mirmu.
Abasomesa balangirira akediimo ku Bbalaza, nga babanja gavumenti ebongeze omusaala gweyabasubiza, nokuwera nti tebagenda kusomesa ngolusoma oluppya lutandise.
Kati bwabadde ayogera ne banamawulire ku media centre, minister omubeezi owabakozi David Karubanga agambye nti wewaayo bewaddeyo okutukiriza byebasubiza absomesa, naye ensimbi teziriiwo.
Agambye nti obuwumbi 63 zezigenda okukola ku misaala gyabakozi mu kitundu ekisooka, wabulanga obuwumbi 49 zigenda kudda mu byanjigiriza.

Payisoggolaasi (Pythogoras)
Payisoggolaasi yali kakensa omubalanguzi (mathematician) eyateekawo Eggereeso lya Payisoggolaasi (the Pythogoras theorem) eryeyambisibwa ennyo mu ssomo ly’essomampimo (geometry) eriri wansi wa sessomo ly’ekibalangulo (the mathematics discipline).
Payisoggolaasi yagereesa nti mu mpetosatu ennesimbu (right angled triangle) era eyitibwa “mpuyisatu ennesimbu” (rightangled trigony), olwesimbu olwa kyebiriga (height squared) gattako olugalamiro olwa kyebiriga (base squared) kyenkana olwewunzifu olwa kyebiriga (hypotenuse squared).
Singa olwesimbu(height) luba “a” ate olugalamiro nga luli “b”, olwewunzifu nga luli “c”, kiba kitegeeza nti enjuyi essatu zonna bw’ozeebiriga (when you square all the three sides), ofuna nakyenkanyanpuyi (equation) bweti: a2+b2= c2. Eryo ly’eggereeso lya Payisoggolaasi.

Abantu 5 abateeberezebwa okwenyigira mu kutemula Omutaka Eng. Daniel Bbosa Kakeedo eyali Lwomwa akulira ekika ky’endiga basindikiddwa ku alimanda okutuusa nga 11 April,2024 lwebalikomezebwawo mu kkooti.
Omulamuzi Adams Byarugaba owa Mwanga II e Mmengo abasindise mu nkomyo oluvannyuma lw’okubasomera omusango gw’obutemu.
Tabakkirizza kubaako kyeboogera nti kubanga omusango gwabwe gwa nnaggomola oguwulirwa kkooti enkulu yokka.
Oludda oluwaabi nga lukulemberwamu Caloline Mpumwire lutegeezezza kkooti nti okunoonyereza ku ttemu lino kukyagenda mu maaso.
Abasindikiddwa ku alimanda kuliko: Luggya Noah abadde mu ddwaliro e Mulago ng’ajjanjabibwa oluvannyuma lw’abatuuze okumukuba nebamutuusaako obuvune ku lunaku lwennyini ettemu lweryariwo.
Abalala kuliko; Milly Naluwenda, Mayanja Ezra, Harriet Nakiguli ne Joseph Nakabaale.
Nga 25 February 2024, abaseddekezi baazinduukiriza Eng. Daniel Bbosa bweyali anaatera okutuuka ewuwe e Lungujja nebamukuba amasasi agaamuttirawo.
Mu kavuvungano ako, abatuuze nga bayambibwako abagoba ba boda boda, baafubutula abatemu nebakwatako babiri, omu nebamukuba nebamutta ate omulala police nemutaasa ate omundi n’adduka.
Police egamba nti ekyawenja abantu abalala ku ttemu lino, era omu ku bbo amanyiddwa nga Tabula Luggya Bbosa agambibwa nti yeyateeka ensimbi mu kusanyaawo omugenzi, police yamuteekako obukadde bw’ensimbi 10 ezinaawebwa omuntu yenna amanyi amayitire ge nabatusaako amawulire ago.
Bisakiddwa: Mpagi Recoboam

Bya Malikh Fahad
Poliisi mu district ye Lyantonde etandise okunonyereza ku butemu obukoleddwa ku bantu 3 abafamire emu, bwe bakubiddwa amasasi agabasse.
Bino bibadde mu kabuga ke Kaliro mu kiro ekikesezza olwaleero abakwata mmundu, era abatamanya ngamba bwebalumbye amaka gomutuuze Moses Lwabagabo, nebamutta ne mukyala we Cellen Nyakato.
Omulala afiridde mu bulumbaganyi buno ye Leokadia Kizza, muganda wabadde omukyala w’omumaka.
Abatuuze bagamba nti bawulidde enduulu namasasai nga gataokota mu kiro wbaula nebatya okudukirira, nga abzigu bayinza aokubakyukira.
Omuddumizi wa poliisi mu district ye Lyantonde Didas Byaruhanga akaksizza ettemu lino, ngagambye nti batandise okunonyereza.
Kati emirambo gitwaliddwa mu gwanika lye ddwaliro ekkulu e Masaka okwongera okwekebejebwa.

ASIKA;
Abamu ku bagenda ne bakyala baabwe wadde oluusi baba n'empapula nga Green Card, okuyimirizaawo amaka oluusi kikaluba abakazi ne bapaala n'Abazungu amaka ne gasasika. Naye si buli Muddugavu avudde kuno ali mu mbeera mbi, waliyo abali obulungi era nga buli kimu basobola okukyetuusaako. Yagambye nti abantu buli muntu gwe bamanyi nti yagendako e Dubai mu bbanga eritali lye wala kati babawenja nga mpiso nga baagala babaveemu si kulwa nga babasiiga ekirwadde kya corona virus.

... 
ayitiddwa ne babatwala ku ddwaliro ne babeekebejja ne basangibwa nga tebalina kirwadde ng’abantu bwe baba bateeberezza.
Yagasseeko nti ku Lw’okuna ku makya, abantu basatu be baasindikiddwa mu ddwaliro e Mulago wadde ng’okuva ku Mmande tebanafuna byavudde mu kukeberebwa okw’abo be bazze basindikayo.
Yategeezezza nti bbo abalwadde beeyongera okweyiwa mu ddwaliro lino okufuna obujjanjabi obwabulijjo nga bafuba okulaba nga bateekawo embeera ebakuuma obutafuna bulwadde gamba ng’okunaaba mu ngalo nga 
...
tunuzibwa mu muntu ku mutwe ne bisoma ebbugumu ly’omubiri nga bino bibadde tebiriiwo.

Wabula waliwo abaagambye nti ono yalwawo okwemulisa kubanga alina mmotoka eziwera nga n’ezimu zisinga n’eno gye yaguze.
Nkonge alina mmotoka ez’enjawulo okuli: Hummer, Benz, Land Cruiser n’endala.
Bbo abaamulabyeko mu bitundu by’e Lwengo baalowoozezza nti ayingizzaawo ekyuma ekipya.
Oba agenda kuddamu okwesimbawo? Nze naawe.
Nkonge y’omu ku bakyala abalina ssente mu Kampala ng’alina ebizimbe n’amasomero mu bitundu by’eggwanga eby’enjawulo era omu ku bammemba b’ekibiina kya Kwagalana.
Abantu abaabadde bamugamba nti ayonoona ssente olw’okukyusakyusa mmotoka yabagambye nti obulamu bwa kiseera bamuleke yeeyagaleko.

Ssemaka asse mukyala we ssaako n’omwana we nga kivudde ku nsonga z’omu kisenge.
Allen Tushabirane myaka 18 nga mutuuze ku kyalo Kagongi mu disitulikiti y’e Mbarara, attiddwa n’omwana we omuwala, abadde agenda okuweza omwaka era emirambo gyonna gisangiddwa mu kitaba ky’omusaayi.
Emirambo gisangiddwako ebiwundu ku bulago era amangu ddala Poliisi eyitiddwa.
Wakati mu ntiisa ng’abatuuze bonna bawuniinkiridde, Poliisi ezudde ejjambiya nga yonna ejjude omusaayi nga kigambibwa ssemaka Julius Kato gye yasobodde okweyambisa.
Abamu ku batuuze, abagaanye okwatuukiriza amaanya gaabwe, bagambye nti Kato nga muvuzi wa bodaboda, abadde alumiriza mukyala we obwenzi nga buli kiro amulemesa okubikula sseemateeka ate nga asukkiridde okumulangira obwavu.
Wabula omwogezi wa Poliisi mu bitundu bye Rwizi Samson Kasasira, agambye nti omusajja aliira ku nsiko mu kiseera kino era Poliisi etandiise okumuyigga ku misango gy’okutta abantu.

Okujulira kwazo zaakututte mu kakiiko ka FUFA akajulirwamu nga zaagala eby'okubazza mu ‘Big League' bisazibwemu, liigi ya babinywera eddemu okumalayo emipiira egitaazannyibwa. Kiddiridde FUFA okusazaamu liigi nga buli ttiimu ekyabuzaayo emipiira etaano olw'ekirwadde kya corona.
Maroons, Tooro United ne Proline ezaali mu bifo ebisatu ebisembayo zaasalwako ate Vipers eyali ekulembedde n'erangirirwa ku bwakyampiyoni.
Ssentebe wa Maroons, Moses Kakungulu ne Alice Namatovu akulira Tooro United be baajulidde ku ky'okubasalako.
Mu bbaluwa gye baawandiikidde akulira emirimu mu FUFA (Edgar Watson), abakungu bano bagamba nti FUFA yakozesa obwannakyemalira okusazaamu liigi nga teyeebuuzizza ku kiraabu nga yeekwasa corona kyokka ate n'erekawo emipiira gya Uganda Cup ne ‘play-Offs' endala.
Bongerako nti FUFA terina mutima gwa mizannyo era terina bwenkanya kuba teyalinda kulaba oba corona asobola okuggwaawo.
